entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 16.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fredericton Int'l Airport 3:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 16.5°C
Pressure: 99.9 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: 10.3°C
Wind: S 24 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this evening then changing to periods of wet snow after midnight and ending before morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 08 May 2016

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 4. POP 60%
